body_html:
In 1.0RC, any update on the following?

 We are working on letting people write LSTMCell + for-loops level RNN code that has CuDNN speeds (we are writing torch.jit optimization passes).

I'd love to see an example or test cases on torch.jit approach.
body_text:
In 1.0RC, any update on the following?

 We are working on letting people write LSTMCell + for-loops level RNN code that has CuDNN speeds (we are writing torch.jit optimization passes). 


I'd love to see an example or test cases on torch.jit approach.
body:
In 1.0RC, any update on the following?

>      We are working on letting people write LSTMCell + for-loops level RNN code that has CuDNN speeds (we are writing torch.jit optimization passes). 

I'd love to see an example or test cases on torch.jit approach.
